snippet: Video uploaded to YouTube appeared to offer images of Iraq’s second-largest city, Mosul, under the control of Islamist militants.
lead_paragraph: Video uploaded to YouTube appeared to offer images of Iraq’s second-largest city, Mosul, under the control of Islamist militants.

headline.main: Glimpses of Mosul in Islamist Hands on YouTube

keywords.value: Islamic State of Iraq and Syria
